            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【一定要茁壮成长！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E6%A0%BD%E7%A7%8D%E7%9A%84%E7%88%B1%E5%BF%83%E6%9E%97%E5%8F%91%E8%8A%BD%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#援鄂医疗队栽种的爱心林发芽了#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，湖北省襄阳市鱼梁洲一片“爱心林”抽枝发芽，长出新叶。一个多月前的3月19日，辽宁、宁夏、福建援襄医疗队代表和部分襄阳代表来到鱼梁洲，种下了这片面积22.5亩、共2020棵的纪念林。此后，援襄医疗队队员们陆续撤离襄阳。（新华社） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497903&amp;ssig=nRcbIVTR7R" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497855480013692" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF3Fq03yQ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 07:02" date="1587855775000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497855480013692:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 07:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

                                <a name="4497851721946384" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF3zm8ali?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 06:47" date="1587854879000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497851721946384:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 06:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【约翰斯·霍普金斯大学：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%8520%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎死亡病例超20万例#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学新冠肺炎疫情实时监测系统显示，截至美东时间25日下午5时31分，新冠病毒在全球造成的死亡病例达到202270例。美国死亡病例达53391例，是全球死亡病例最多的国家。<br>数据显示，截至目前，全球新冠病毒感染人数已经超过2 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF3zm8ali" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497851721946384:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497851721946384&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8793%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超过93万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学疫情实时监测系统显示，截至美东时间25日下午5时31分，美国共有新冠病毒感染病例933050例，其中包括死亡病例53391例。与该系统约24小时前的数据相比，美国新增感染病例42526例，新增死亡病例2374例。<br>纽约州目前有感染病例282143例，包括 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF3qrdaJp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497846193139519:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497846193139519&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】“只要被问病毒，你就攻击中国”，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%85%9A%E7%AB%9E%E9%80%89%E7%AD%96%E7%95%A5%E5%A4%87%E5%BF%98%E5%BD%95%E6%9B%9D%E5%85%89%23&amp;from=default">#美国共和党竞选策略备忘录曝光#</a>，遭美国网友斥为“谎话红皮书”。这番操弄肮脏而又拙劣，但并不让人惊愕。多年来每逢大选，美国政客一贯如此。为了狭隘的党派利益，一次次刷新底线，何其丑陋。越攻击中国越自证心虚，抗疫不力的锅是甩不出去的！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <p class="icon"><span class="W_icon icon_rederrorS"></span></p><p class="txt">由于用户设置，你无法回复评论。</p>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497903&amp;ssig=nRcbIVTR7R" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497715096687004" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF00Zs3AU?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 21:45" date="1587822305000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497715096687004:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 21:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：有一种思念，叫不联系不打扰】生命中总有许多人不能陪你走完一生，而是在某段时光里带给你温暖和力量。人生的聚散离合，有时并不由我们左右；有些感情，只适合留在心里。相聚时，好好珍惜；缘散时，不必纠缠。人越长大，越喜欢把对一个人的思念调成静音模式。不再打扰，不会联系，也不曾忘记。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF00Zs3AU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497715096687004:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497715096687004&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

        <!--区别处理-->
        <div class="WB_feed_spec WB_feed_spec_c S_bg1 S_line1 clearfix" action-type="widget_articleLayer" action-data="url=https%3A%2F%2Fweibo.com%2Fttarticle%2Fp%2Fshow%3Fid%3D2309404497715097633113&amp;target=_blank" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_card:4497715096687004:1022-article:4497715096687004:1022%3A2309404497715097633113:page_100206_home:2803301701:230940:2803301701:4497715096687004:2803301701:230940" exp-data="key=tblog_weibocard&amp;value=1022-article:4497715096687004:ori:4497715096687004:page:2803301701:230940&amp;src=//rs.sinajs.cn/j.gif">
        <div class="spec_box clearfix">
            <div class="WB_feed_spec_pic S_bg1 WB_feed_spec_pic_h">

            <div class="WB_feed_spec_info SW_fun">
                <div class="WB_feed_spec_cont">
                    <h4 class="WB_feed_spec_tit W_autocut">【夜读】有一种思念，叫不联系不打扰</h4>
                                    </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497903&amp;ssig=nRcbIVTR7R" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497697907955053" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEZzgxntj?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 20:36" date="1587818207000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497697907955053:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 20:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【雾里看花 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%B0%E9%9B%AA%E9%87%8C%E7%9A%84%E6%9D%9C%E9%B9%83%E8%8A%B1%23&amp;from=default">#冰雪里的杜鹃花#</a>你见过吗<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c9/2018new_chongjing_org.png" title="[憧憬]" alt="[憧憬]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】四川攀枝花，格萨拉景区于昨天18时许开始飘雨，今天凌晨3时许开始飘雪，早上6时出现结冰现象。虽然此次降雪雪量不大，但景区内有浓雾，气温也比较低。杜鹃花等植物上已经有雪堆积，白里透红，花瓣冰冷坚硬。你想去看看吗？<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497697907955053:1034-video:1034%3A4497656462901279:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497697907955053:2803301701" title="四川观察的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wk4GfB" alt="http://t.cn/A6wk4GfB" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>四川观察的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497687862366440" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEZj49VCo?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 19:56" date="1587815811000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497687862366440:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 19:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【不打疫苗是拿孩子生命开玩笑！转存<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%84%BF%E7%AB%A5%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E8%A1%A8%23&amp;from=default">#儿童疫苗接种时间表#</a>】今天，第34个全国儿童预防接种宣传日。接种疫苗是预防和控制传染病最经济、最有效的方法之一。目前，我国有多种免费疫苗，可预防乙肝、结核病、脊髓灰质炎等。如何安全接种？可随意不接种吗？关于疫苗你一定要知道↓↓转给新手爸妈！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%AE%97%E6%9D%91%E5%BA%84%E9%A5%AE%E7%94%A8%E6%B0%B4%E5%BC%82%E5%B8%B8%E7%B3%BB%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E5%91%98%E8%BF%9D%E8%A7%84%E6%93%8D%E4%BD%9C%E6%89%80%E8%87%B4%23&amp;from=default">#广宗村庄饮用水异常系技术员违规操作所致#</a>】据广宗发布：该事件系广宗县志通电动自行车厂23日晚利用自来水向酸洗槽注水过程中，现场操作技术员未按照操作规范关闭注水管，供水站停水后致酸液倒流入供水管道所致。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E8%87%AA%E6%9D%A5%E6%B0%B4%E5%BC%82%E5%B8%B8%E4%BA%8B%E4%BB%B63%E5%90%8D%E5%AB%8C%E7%96%91%E4%BA%BA%E8%A2%AB%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%B6%23&amp;from=default">#河北自来水异常事件3名嫌疑人被控制#</a>，企业法人代表已自首。                                            </div>

                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">

                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4497589754217255" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民日报" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民日报</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E5%B9%BF%E5%AE%97%E4%B8%89%E6%9D%91%E5%BA%84%E8%87%AA%E6%9D%A5%E6%B0%B4%E5%8F%91%E9%BB%84%E8%B5%B7%E6%B3%A1%23&amp;from=default">#河北广宗三村庄自来水发黄起泡#</a> 官方回应正在调查】24日，河北广宗县五里庄、赵家吾、李家庄等3个村居民用水出现异常，水质发黄起泡沫并有异味。村民称，自来水管里流出来的水有刺鼻味道，流到地上会腐蚀地面，洗脸有被烧伤情况。当地回应立即停止使用自来水，事件原因调查中。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497589754217255:2017607-video:2017607%3A4497559238934559:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497682141794230:2803301701" title="一手video的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDbbxe" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDbbxe" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>一手video的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2885862981&amp;cid=4497685883070909&amp;nick=苏莱曼的国权&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497903&amp;ssig=nRcbIVTR7R" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497677959715581" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEZ35ELsV?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 19:17" date="1587813451000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497677959715581:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 19:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E6%AF%8F%E5%A4%A9%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%8A%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0%E4%B8%8D%E8%B6%852.5%E5%B0%8F%E6%97%B6%23&amp;from=default">#小学生每天线上学习不超2.5小时#</a>】今天，国家卫健委发布了《儿童青少年新冠肺炎疫情期间近视预防指引（更新版）》，国家<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%AB%E5%81%A5%E5%A7%94%E5%AF%B9%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%8A%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E5%81%9A%E5%87%BA%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%23&amp;from=default">#卫健委对中小学生线上学习时间做出限制#</a>，小学生每天不超过2.5小时，每次不超过20分钟；中学生每天不超过4小时，每次不超过30分钟。减少线上学习外的视屏时间，除 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEZ35ELsV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497677959715581:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497677959715581&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2350%E5%B9%B4%E5%89%8D%E8%88%AA%E5%A4%A9%E5%91%98%E6%80%8E%E6%A0%B7%E8%AE%AD%E7%BB%83%23&amp;from=default">#50年前航天员怎样训练#</a>？】一段珍贵影像，记录了上世纪70年代<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%80%E6%97%A9%E8%88%AA%E5%A4%A9%E5%91%98%E8%AE%AD%E7%BB%83%E7%94%BB%E9%9D%A2%23&amp;from=default">#中国最早航天员训练画面#</a>：小型飞机改装成临时失重实验室，在高速进行抛物线飞行时，实现40多秒失重状态，航天员就在这样的失重环境中练习吃饭、喝水的过程……老一辈航天人在艰苦条件中追寻梦想。致敬中国航天人！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497667134626045:1034-video:1034%3A4497630320066596:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497667134626045:2803301701" title="央视军事的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDkbW3" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDkbW3" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视军事的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【考生们注意！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E8%B0%83%E5%89%825%E6%9C%8820%E6%97%A5%E5%B7%A6%E5%8F%B3%E5%BC%80%E9%80%9A%23&amp;from=default">#考研网上调剂5月20日左右开通#</a>】4月26日至30日，教育部将在“中国研究生招生信息网”组织举办“2020年研考招生复试网上咨询”活动，各招生单位将为考生答疑解惑。教育部网上调剂系统预计于5月20日左右开通，考生可登陆中国研究生招生信息网查看相关信息，达到条件要求者可申请调剂。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEYADjMxz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497660314714825:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497660314714825&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4497638717839997" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEY1NwTxz?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 16:41" date="1587804094000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497638717839997:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 16:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%AD%94%E7%96%91%E5%B8%B8%E9%98%B3%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#援鄂一线专家答疑常阳患者#</a>】据国家卫健委医政医管局监察专员焦雅辉介绍，武汉现有确诊病例中有30多人长期核酸不转阴，为常阳患者。常阳患者有哪些特点？为什么会核酸常阳？为什么<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B8%B8%E9%98%B3%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E7%90%86%E8%AE%BA%E4%B8%8A%E5%85%B7%E4%BC%A0%E6%9F%93%E6%80%A7%23&amp;from=default">#常阳患者理论上具传染性#</a>？为何不需要治疗？核酸转阴的可能性有多大？如何正常生活？看援鄂一线专家释疑→&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEY1NwTxz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497638717839997:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497638717839997&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7291617014" usercard="id=7291617014">城南月涌</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member5"></em></a>：是否具有传染性，要看患者体内是否存在活病毒，如果有，那么理论上仍有传染性，只不过症状不明显者，一般传染性较弱；如果只是死病毒，会在一段时间内自然代谢掉，不具备传染性。“这种阳性会持续多久，新冠还没有标准，参考流感病毒，一般转阴不会超过一周。        </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今年<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%233%E6%9C%88%E6%88%B7%E5%9D%87%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%8E%A5%E5%85%A5%E6%B5%81%E9%87%8F%E8%BE%BE9.5GB%23&amp;from=default">#3月户均移动互联网接入流量达9.5GB#</a>，你贡献了多少？】今天下午，国务院联防联控机制召开新闻发布会，工信部信息技术发展司一级巡视员李颖介绍，2020年我国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E5%AD%A3%E5%BA%A6%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%8E%A5%E5%85%A5%E6%B5%81%E9%87%8F%E5%90%8C%E6%AF%94%E5%A2%9E%E9%95%BF39.3%25%23&amp;from=default">#一季度移动互联网接入流量同比增长39.3%#</a>，今年3月户均移动互联网接入流量达9.5GB，为近12个月以来的最高点。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497636982193900:1042163-video:1042163%3A4497636917444617:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497636982193900:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wkvfDW" alt="http://t.cn/A6wkvfDW" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            </li>
        </ul>
    
<!-- /VideoCard -->

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4497632372448314" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEXRzagUW?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 16:16" date="1587802582000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497632372448314:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 16:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家邮政局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%92%E9%87%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%B6%852%E4%BA%BF%E4%BB%B6%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E8%87%B3%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%89%8D%23&amp;from=default">#快递量日超2亿件基本恢复至疫情前#</a>水平】25日，国家邮政局市场监管司副司长边作栋表示，实物商品网络零售额已经占到社会消费品零售总额五分之一。现在每天的快递量已经超过2亿件，已经基本恢复到疫情前正常水平。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497632372448314:1042163-video:1042163%3A4497632320749580:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497632372448314:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDkVL1" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDkVL1" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">

        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497628299972832" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEXKZFQo8?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 16:00" date="1587801611000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497628299972832:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%84%88%E5%90%8E%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E6%9C%89%E5%85%B3%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#湖北介绍新冠肺炎出院患者愈后康复服务有关工作#</a>情况】4月25日下午四点，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第84场新闻发布会，介绍新冠肺炎出院患者愈后康复服务有关工作情况，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497628299972832:1034-video:1034%3A4497643590582295:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497628299972832:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDgKn6" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDgKn6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【网购节来了！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23109%E5%AE%B6%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E5%B0%86%E5%8F%82%E4%B8%8E%E5%8F%8C%E5%93%81%E7%BD%91%E8%B4%AD%E8%8A%82%23&amp;from=default">#109家平台将参与双品网购节#</a>】商务部电子商务司副司长蔡裕东介绍，4月28日到5月10日，商务部、工信部、国家邮政局等部门将联合举办网购节，参与平台达到109家，小而美的网络品牌，中华老字号，“三品一标”认证农产品，优质家电产品都将涵盖其中，给消费者提供实在的优惠。 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2803301701&amp;mid=4497625594420699&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1ge629puq11j20m80go0uz" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=a716fd45ly1ge629puq11j20m80go0uz"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEXGDiy1B" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497625594420699:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497625594420699&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497623106841892" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEXCCsHT6?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 15:39" date="1587800372000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497623106841892:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 15:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【转发提醒！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%977%E5%A4%A7%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%23&amp;from=default">#接种疫苗7大建议#</a>】①疫苗是提升可预防疾病免疫力的重要手段之一；②成人免疫同样不容忽视；③佐剂与疫苗保护效力密切相关；④疫苗尽早接种尽早获益……疫苗并非儿童专利，成人免疫同样不容忽视。关于疫苗的7大建议↓↓戳图学习！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8F%90%E9%AB%98%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%E5%8A%9B%23&amp;from=default">#接种疫苗提高免疫力#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E6%97%B6%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=健康时报">@健康时报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497616198674532" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEXrtAoDO?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 15:12" date="1587798726000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497616198674532:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 15:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%9D%A5%E6%BA%90%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A0%E5%88%B050%E4%B8%AA%23&amp;from=default">#境外输入来源国增加到50个#</a>】4月24日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD10%E5%A4%A9%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国连续10天无新增死亡病例#</a>，重症病例波动下降，救治效果明显；境外输入来源国增加到50个，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%237%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BD%E6%8A%A5%E5%91%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%88%96%E7%96%91%E4%BC%BC%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#7省份报告新增境外输入确诊或疑似病例#</a>，防范境外输入病例引发本土疫情任务依然艰巨，要突出重点做好精准防控，常备不懈抓好个人防护，最大限度减少传播风 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEXrtAoDO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497616198674532:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497616198674532&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IEXoJ7LOp&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497913&amp;ssig=w1hNzCy8V7" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497614491852089" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEXoJ7LOp?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 15:05" date="1587798319000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497614491852089:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 15:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【最新进展：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E5%B9%BF%E5%AE%97%E4%B8%89%E6%9D%91%E8%87%AA%E6%9D%A5%E6%B0%B4%E8%A2%AB%E6%B7%B7%E5%85%A5%E9%85%B8%E7%B1%BB%E7%89%A9%E8%B4%A8%23&amp;from=default">#河北广宗三村自来水被混入酸类物质#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%AE%97%E5%A5%96%E5%8A%B110%E4%B8%87%E7%94%A8%E4%BA%8E%E6%9F%A5%E6%98%8E%E6%B1%A1%E6%9F%93%E6%BA%90%23&amp;from=default">#广宗奖励10万用于查明污染源#</a>】广宗县人民政府25日发布最新通告称，涉及村庄属于农村联村供水第8供水站，供水站分南北两路供水，经初步检测，供水站及北路水质正常，南路供水管网被混入不明酸类物质。为尽快查明污染源，请知情者积极提供线索，一经 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEXoJ7LOp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497614491852089:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497614491852089&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497605461295683" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEXaa5r47?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 14:29" date="1587796166000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497605461295683:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 14:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">四川<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AD%A6%E6%96%B9%E6%8A%93%E8%8E%B722%E5%B2%81A%E7%BA%A7%E9%80%9A%E7%BC%89%E4%BB%A4%E9%80%83%E7%8A%AF%23&amp;from=default">#警方抓获22岁A级通缉令逃犯#</a>】4月24日，公安部对13名重大涉黑涉恶逃犯发布A级通缉令。四川达州市公安局、渠县公安局民警在广东警方的支持下，在广东省东莞市将13名A级通缉令逃犯之一的金某霞（女，22岁，广东人）抓获。目前，案件正在进一步办理中。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E8%BE%BE%E5%B7%9E?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安达州">@平安达州</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=3248036930&amp;cid=4497609165294052&amp;nick=zu海洋&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-25 14:44</div>

                                <a name="4497598222514838" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEWYuaydU?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 14:00" date="1587794440000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497598222514838:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 14:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【小哥厉害！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%92%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%E4%BF%84%E8%AF%AD%E8%87%AA%E5%A6%82%E4%BA%A4%E6%B5%81%23&amp;from=default">#绥芬河快递小哥俄语自如交流#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】23日，绥芬河某快递站的小哥刘发秀了一波神操作，他在站点用流利的俄语告诉对方“包裹先寄存在我这里，等你回来再给你派送。”原来，在绥芬河做生意的俄罗斯人最近回国了，包裹无人接收，刘发就切换成俄语交流。网友：全都型人才！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497598222514838:1034-video:1034%3A4496972573507632:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497598222514838:2803301701" title="新晚报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6w1FUst" alt="http://t.cn/A6w1FUst" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>新晚报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497589754217255" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEWKPhH6f?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 13:27" date="1587792421000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497589754217255:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 13:27</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E5%B9%BF%E5%AE%97%E4%B8%89%E6%9D%91%E5%BA%84%E8%87%AA%E6%9D%A5%E6%B0%B4%E5%8F%91%E9%BB%84%E8%B5%B7%E6%B3%A1%23&amp;from=default">#河北广宗三村庄自来水发黄起泡#</a> 官方回应正在调查】24日，河北广宗县五里庄、赵家吾、李家庄等3个村居民用水出现异常，水质发黄起泡沫并有异味。村民称，自来水管里流出来的水有刺鼻味道，流到地上会腐蚀地面，洗脸有被烧伤情况。当地回应立即停止使用自来水，事件原因调查中。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497589754217255:2017607-video:2017607%3A4497559238934559:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497589754217255:2803301701" title="一手video的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDbbxe" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDbbxe" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>一手video的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2908878743&amp;cid=4497590210541292&amp;nick=一只会双综滑雪的大胖鹅&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497584041318501" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEWBC5x09?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 13:04" date="1587791059000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497584041318501:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 13:04</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【河北<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BF%9D%E5%AE%9A%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B64%E5%8F%A3%E8%A2%AB%E5%AE%B3%E8%AD%A6%E6%96%B9%E6%82%AC%E8%B5%8F5%E4%B8%87%E8%BF%BD%E5%87%B6%23&amp;from=default">#保定一家4口被害警方悬赏5万追凶#</a>】据河北保定<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%B8%85%E8%8B%91%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E5%8F%91%E8%A8%80%E4%BA%BA?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=清苑公安网络发言人">@清苑公安网络发言人</a> ，24日，该地发生一起4人死亡重大刑事案件。经公安机关进一步侦查，确定王会强有重大作案嫌疑。目前，警方已发通告，悬赏5万元人民币缉凶。<br>王会强，男，汉族，1983年生人，清苑区魏村镇魏村北街人，身份证号码130622198309195 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEWBC5x09" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497584041318501:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497584041318501&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E8%AF%B4%E5%B8%8C%E6%9C%9B%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E5%9C%A8%E5%A4%A7%E4%BC%97%E9%9D%A2%E5%89%8D%E8%B6%8A%E5%B0%91%E8%B6%8A%E5%A5%BD%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏说希望出现在大众面前越少越好#</a>】张文宏医生表示，我自己当然非常希望，在大众面前出现的一些机会越少越好，当大众不需要听我们传染病医生、疾控医生意见的时候，一定是世界岁月静好的时光。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497576654712925:1042163-video:1042163%3A4497576620392454:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497576654712925:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDJJMl" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDJJMl" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%90%83%E4%B8%8D%E5%90%83%E7%B2%A5%E5%BC%95%E5%8F%91%E8%AE%A8%E8%AE%BA%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏回应吃不吃粥引发讨论#</a>：有讨论是好事】今天，张文宏医生在接受<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 专访时回应吃不吃粥引发讨论：“这些事情超出了我的想象，但是我认为有讨论就是好事。（关于疫苗）现在就怕大家不知道，哪怕很多人原来不知道，现在知道了这个事情，获益了就起到作用了”。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497573479554893:1042163-video:1042163%3A4497573378195484:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497573479554893:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDMahc" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDMahc" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4497569499163361" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEWe9CrO9?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 12:06" date="1587787592000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497569499163361:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 12:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%AF%E4%BA%BA%E4%BA%BA%E8%A6%81%E6%89%93%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏回应新冠疫苗是不是人人要打#</a>】张文宏医生表示，现在疫苗的临床试验的结果没有出来，三期临床试验全世界都还没开展，所以拿不到疫苗保护效果的数据。是不是人人都打，取决于几个数据，第一不良反应有多大，第二它的保护率有多高，第三当时全世界的疫情有多高，第四病死率会降到什么样的程度， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEWe9CrO9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497569499163361:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497569499163361&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E8%BF%9B%E5%B1%95%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏回应新冠疫苗进展#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E6%B2%A1%E6%9C%89%E5%81%9A%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E5%B0%8F%E7%99%BD%E9%BC%A0%E8%BF%99%E7%A7%8D%E6%B5%81%E7%A8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#我国没有做疫苗小白鼠这种流程#</a>】张文宏医生表示，加快疫苗进度，不代表放弃它的疗效跟不良反应评估。新冠肺炎是突发传染病，危及全世界人民生命，所以国家加快了审批的流程。将来还要做三期临床研究，三期研究认为是安全的，再给老百姓打。“哪里有什么做小白鼠的事情， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEWax56YV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497567251218481:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497567251218481&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497921&amp;ssig=tWDLLFIqH4" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497564039070022" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEW5lC3wG?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 11:44" date="1587786290000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497564039070022:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 11:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%A7%91%E6%99%AE%E6%88%90%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E8%AF%A5%E6%89%93%E5%93%AA%E4%BA%9B%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏科普成人应该打哪些疫苗#</a>】张文宏医生表示，每年冬季都会有流感的大暴发，今年新冠的暴发，再夹杂流感的暴发，对老年人、成年人都是极大的风险。（成年人应该打）流感季节的疫苗，青年女性在成年之前最好打预防宫颈癌的HPV疫苗。更多↓↓<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%A7%91%E6%99%AE%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏科普疫苗接种#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497564039070022:1042163-video:1042163%3A4497563949400092:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497564039070022:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wD5Kl5" alt="http://t.cn/A6wD5Kl5" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4497561894962087&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2803301701%26mid%3D4497561894962087&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>

                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497921&amp;ssig=tWDLLFIqH4" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497561894962087" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEW1TkORF?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 11:36" date="1587785779000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497561894962087:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 11:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【张文宏科普：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%E4%B8%8B%E4%B8%8D%E5%BA%94%E5%B8%A6%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E6%89%93%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%23&amp;from=default">#什么情况下不应带孩子打疫苗#</a>？】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%A7%91%E6%99%AE%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏科普疫苗接种#</a> 今天，张文宏医生在接受<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 专访时指出，孩子在生病期间打疫苗，疫苗的不良反应有时会激发免疫状态，出现发烧，跟已有疾病交叉，疾病有加重现象。同时文宏医生提醒，孩子接种疫苗要与医院感染科医生进行沟通。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEW1TkORF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497561894962087:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497561894962087&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%A7%91%E6%99%AE%E5%93%AA%E4%BA%9B%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E5%BA%94%E8%AF%A5%E6%89%93%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏科普哪些疫苗孩子应该打#</a>】张文宏医生表示，我们现在打疫苗，一般是一类疫苗孩子是必打，二类疫苗医生提倡打。一类苗、二类苗都很重要，如果不打，重点人群、高风险的人群就面临风险。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%A7%91%E6%99%AE%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏科普疫苗接种#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497559131205541:1042163-video:1042163%3A4497558945333277:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497559131205541:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wDb295" alt="http://t.cn/A6wDb295" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2204839232" usercard="id=2204839232">racer007</a><a class="icon_icon" title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://car.weibo.com/pc/view?page=123456"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans2"></i></a>：你们为啥老摁着张医生一个人采访呀？医学领域没有其它专家？并不是说张医生不好，有些医学生活知识，对于医生来说是常识，其它医生应也可以。啥事都去采访人家，不影响人家工作吗？他时间也有限吧。你们是不是准备出个张医生语录呀？        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497549769480171" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEVIkDMdZ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 10:48" date="1587782888000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497549769480171:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 10:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【北京：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%92%B3%E5%97%BD%E6%8E%A9%E5%8F%A3%E9%BC%BB%E6%84%9F%E5%86%92%E6%88%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E6%AD%A3%E5%BC%8F%E5%86%99%E5%85%A5%E6%B3%95%E8%A7%84%23&amp;from=default">#咳嗽掩口鼻感冒戴口罩正式写入法规#</a>】昨日《北京市文明行为促进条例》通过：公共场所咳嗽、打喷嚏时遮掩口鼻，患有流行性感冒等传染性呼吸道疾病时佩戴口罩，不在地铁、轻轨等列车内进食，餐饮服务企业应当配备公筷公勺，有条件的应当推行分餐制，不在公共场所赤膊，这些条款正式写入法规。《 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEVIkDMdZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497549769480171:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497549769480171&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【张文宏来了！中午11点，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E8%81%8A%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8E%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E9%82%A3%E4%BA%9B%E4%BA%8B%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏聊关于疫苗那些事#</a>】4月25日，第34个全国儿童预防接种宣传日。关于疫苗，你有哪些疑问？今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 将对话张文宏医生，聊聊关于预防接种那些事儿。欢迎留言提问，你的问题可能得到他的解答！中午11点<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%A7%91%E6%99%AE%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏科普疫苗接种#</a>，现场直播，共同关注！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                             【一定要茁壮成长！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E6%A0%BD%E7%A7%8D%E7%9A%84%E7%88%B1%E5%BF%83%E6%9E%97%E5%8F%91%E8%8A%BD%E4%BA%86%23&from=default\">#援鄂医疗队栽种的爱心林发芽了#<\/a><img class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/8a\/2018new_xin_org.png\" title=\"[心]\" alt=    \"[心]\" type=\"face\" \/>】近日，湖北省襄阳市鱼梁洲一片“爱心林”抽枝发芽，长出新叶。一个多月前的3月19日，辽宁、宁夏、福建援襄医疗队代表和部分襄阳代表来到鱼梁洲，种下了这片面积22.5亩、共2020棵的纪念林。此后，援襄医疗队队员们陆续撤离襄阳。（新华社） ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                                                           【夜读：有一种思念，叫不联系不打扰】生命中总有许多人不能陪你走完一生，而是在某段时光里带给你温暖和力量。人生的聚散离合，有时并不由我们左右；有些感情，只适合留在心里。相聚时，好好珍惜；缘散时，不必纠缠。人越长大，越喜欢把对一个人的思念调成静音模式。不再打扰，不会联系，也不曾忘记。 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2803301701\/IF00Zs3AU\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4497715096687004:2803301701\" action-type=\"fl_unfold\" action-data=\"mid=4497715096687004&is_settop&is_sethot&is_setfanstop&is_setyoudao&is_from_ad=0\">展开全文<i class=\"W_ficon ficon_arrow_down\">c<\/i><\/a> \/>】四川攀枝花，格萨拉景区于昨天18时许开始飘雨，今天凌晨3时许开始飘雪，早上6时出现结冰现象。虽然此次降雪雪量不大，但景区内有浓雾，气温也比较低。杜鹃花等植物上已经有雪堆积，白里透红，花瓣冰冷坚硬。你想去看看吗？<a                                                                                                              【不打疫苗是拿孩子生命开玩笑！转存<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%84%BF%E7%AB%A5%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E8%A1%A8%23&from=default\">#儿童疫苗接种时间表#<\/a>】今天，第34个全国儿童预防接种宣传日。接种疫苗是预防和控制传染病最经济、最有效的方法之一。目前，我国有多种免费疫苗，可预防乙肝、结核病、脊髓灰质炎等。如何安全接种？可随意不接种吗？关于疫苗你一定要知道↓↓转给新手爸妈！ 官方回应正在调查】24日，河北广宗县五里庄、赵家吾、李家庄等3个村居民用水出现异常，水质发黄起泡沫并有异味。村民称，自来水管里流出来的水有刺鼻味道，流到地上会腐蚀地面，洗脸有被烧伤情况。当地回应立即停止使用自来水，事件原因调查中。<a                                 <a href="javascript:void(0);" title="列表循环" class="ico_ctrl ico_loop" node-type="play_type_select_loop" action-type="play_type_select"></a>
                            </p>
                        <div class="contrl_bar clearfix">   
                            <div class="base_ctrl">
                                <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_prev" action-type="prev" title="上一首"></a>

                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
